db:abstract.db:para: A module with a set of QML elements that arrange QML items in a user interface.

db:article.db:para: Qt Quick Layouts are a set of QML types used to arrange items in a user interface. In contrast to positioners, Qt Quick Layouts can also resize their items. This makes them well suited for resizable user interfaces. Since layouts are items they can consequently be nested.
The module is new in Qt 5.1 and requires Qt Quick 2.1.
Visit the Qt Quick Layouts Overview page to get started.
